meaning: discontinue, sever, cut off, abstain, interrupt, suppress, be beyond, without match, peerless, unparalleled

onyomiExamples.meaning: starting field which contains the November and/or December 20-point card
breaking off relations, disconnection, insulation (esp. electrical), isolation

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to die out, to peter out, to become extinct, to cease, to be stopped, to be discontinued, to be cut off
to exterminate, to eradicate, to wipe out, to put an end to, to let (fire) go out, to let die (e.g. flowers), to run out of
to sever, to cut off, to suppress, to eradicate, to exterminate, to abstain (from), to give up
